name: GroupBox
desc: A stylized view, with an optional label, that visually collects a logical grouping of content.

items.name: init(content: () -> Content)
items.desc: Creates an unlabeled group box with the provided view content.

items.name: init(content: () -> Content, label: () -> Label)
items.desc: Creates a group box with the provided label and view content.

items.name: init(LocalizedStringKey, content: () -> Content)
items.desc: Creates a group box with the provided view content and title.

items.name: init<S>(S, content: () -> Content)
items.desc: Creates a group box with the provided view content.

items.name: init(GroupBoxStyleConfiguration)
items.desc: Creates a group box based on a style configuration.

items.name: struct GroupBoxStyleConfiguration
items.desc: The properties of a group box instance.

items.name: func groupBoxStyle<S>(S) -> some View
items.desc: Sets the style for group boxes within this view.

items.name: protocol GroupBoxStyle
items.desc: A type that specifies the appearance and interaction of all group boxes within a view hierarchy.

items.name: var body: some View
items.desc: The content and behavior of the view.

items.name: typealias Body
items.desc: The type of view representing the body of this view.

declaration: struct GroupBox<Label, Content> where Label : View, Content : View
